title: Zesty sea bream with potato and tomato bake

ingredients.item: 2 packs Waitrose sea bream with lemon and chervil butter

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220Â°C, gas mark 7. Toss the sliced potatoes and tomatoes in a large bowl with the garlic and the oil; season. Arrange evenly in a baking tin, pour over the wine and bake for 35-45 minutes, until golden and cooked through.

When the bake is almost ready, heat the lemon butter from the sea bream fillets in a large frying pan over a high heat. Season the fish, put into the pan skin-side down and cook for 3 minutes, until golden and crisp. Use a spatula to flip the fillets over and cook for 1 minute more.
Divide the baked vegetables between 4 plates and top with the fish. Garnish with green salad leaves
